english: The package should n't carry written message .
He proofread completed letters very carefully .
chinese: 他把完成的书信很小心地校对。

english: It may be that they would have as euphuistic as the letters of queen elizabeth .
chinese: 也许会象伊丽莎白女王的书信那样矫揉造作罢。

english: Hardly less enjoyment and insight are to be got from adams's correspondence .
chinese: 我们还可以从亚当斯的书信里得到同样的乐趣和洞见。

english: A reference to "natural law" can be found in the epistle of paul to the romans .
chinese: 在圣保罗致罗马人的使徒书信中就已论及了“自然法”。
书信造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: A letter of congratulations and good wishes builds continued goodwill toward your company .
chinese: 一封恭贺及表示良好祝愿的书信会给你公司培育出一种持续的友好关系。

english: There is nothing secretive about the ombudsman's work, for his correspondence is open to public inspection .
chinese: 特派员的工作没有什么秘密可言，因为他的来往书信可供公众审查。

english: In this collection there was a certain continuity of personnel and anecdote in one series of five letters .
chinese: 在这本书信集里，每5封信成一组，其中的人物和轶事有一定的连续性。

english: She discovered a few points at strong resemblance between these letters and some that it had been her own fate to receive .
chinese: 她发现这些书信中有几处跟她接到的情书有惊人的相似之处。

english: Then he went absent-mindedly through the pile of papers on his desk, writing in his occasional notes: “go to spain?”
chinese: 然后他心不在焉地翻阅了书桌上一堆书信文件，在他零星的日记里写道：“到西班牙去？”

english: When i left rome i corresponded with him, and about once in two months received from him long letters in queer english .
chinese: 我离开罗马后同他继续有书信来往，每两个月左右我就接到他用怪里怪气的英语写的一封长信。

english: A well-expressed letter makes a far more positive impression on the reader than does an awkwardly phrased, jargon-filled letter .
chinese: 一封表达贴切的书信对读者产生的印象远比一封词法别扭、废话连篇的书信产生的印象积极得多。

english: I fear my julia will not deign my lines
chinese: 我担心我的朱莉亚不会欣然接受我的书信。

english: A cultural comparison between the letters in china and japan
On mr . chen yuan and his son , mr . chen lesu ' s academic rout
